summary: A romantic comedy that explores the adult film industry through the eyes of an idealistic 25 year-old award winning film school grad.
cast: Leelee Sobieski|Matthew Davis|Denise Richards|DonnaMarie Recco|Jamie Kennedy|Kristen Johnston|Mircea Monroe|P.J. Jones|Julie Davis|G.K. Bowes|R.J. Hampton|Michael Harris|Garrett Honea|Sue Melanson|Saybher Perrigo|Paloma Stark|Randy Weatherbee
title: Finding Bliss
